review: Got Several  Sticks And there amazing ..Has tons of apps .. I was even able to drop in a few custom apps for free Live TV .. Good Bye cable bill ... hahaha  See ya don't want to be ya .... Cord Cutting is where its at.....
author: Jaime P.

review: Other then a very cheap quality plastic remote... Everything is good...
author: Hardik Patel

review: Solid device.. Burns through far more data than the chromecast. The video quality is laggy on any app that is not the amazon pre bundled video servce. Hulu and Netflix both suffer from excessive lagging. Good for what it is, and invaluable if you are a prime member. It far exceeds the apps on the xbox and playstation. Not an all in one solution for varied streaming services.
author: KCS316

review: good piece of gear easy to use and inexpensive saves work on my consoles running Netflix and prime
author: Brian Thomas

review: Does everything I want and for being small packs a huge punch...I have a Chromecast and I like the firestick better if I must be honest
author: Charles

review: Got this at the intro $18 price and for that it's great. Took off a star for requiring an electrical outlet. It's the only wire hanging down for us and also seems unnecessary (and a power drrain)

review: Can't wait to start using this.

review: Had a few problems initially getting this to work, but it seems to come up every time now.  Very easy to install!
